$95 million donated to Red Cross Bushfire fund BUT “some of the funds would be saved to spend towards disasters in the future“. People didn’t donate so the Red Cross could bank. There are people living in tents who’ve lost homes and whole communities in distress. Spend the money.

My concern about where all these funds are going from the Fire Concert performed in Sydney is;

Funds raised will be split between the RFS, RSPCA, and Mr Dutton's Red Cross Disaster Relief Fund and Management...the latter is as I understand it a Fund set up for future disasters.

text:
Your generosity keeps coming. As of today, you’ve donated $150M to the Disaster Relief & Recovery fund. Here’s how it’s being allocated to help bushfire-affected families + communities to alleviate financial hardship, rebuild & recover.

Read our plan: https://t.co/Kg9Zdzx8Fs https://t.co/BGO6zNa3xF

Nearly $5m raised by the tennis community for bushfire relief. Thank you for your donations, let’s keep the ball rolling. 

https://t.co/jidzZJXhRt

“I didn’t know what to do until I came here but then Red Cross grabbed me, put me under their wing and away I went.”   
For months our teams have been providing vital support to ppl like Matt. The latest update: https://t.co/29JkaBnMck

👥 England Netball stand shoulder to shoulder with @NetballAust and all affected by the devastating bushfires.

We'll be supporting the relief and recovery efforts throughout the Vitality Netball Nations Cup.

🇦🇺 Red Cross Disaster & Relief Recovery fund: https://t.co/S1JH1uVVze https://t.co/0AP3XAzuiV

I’m selling chocolate covered strawberries for $1 each and all proceeds will be donated to the Australian RedCross to aid with the bushfire damages. Any amount is appreciated and even an RT goes a long way! https://t.co/lWv6LFxBSP

Our Bushfire Advisory Panel met this week. From Monday we'll start distributing new financial assistance. This weekend we're getting systems and teams ready to make it as easy as possible for ppl to access this additional help. https://t.co/isB82aPj3l
